Class Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bus

  • public class Bus
extends java.lang.Object
    The bus object stores int CAPACITY as the number of passengers that can board on the bus.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bus

        public Bus(int timeRest,
           boolean isIn)
        The constructor of bus object. Take 2 parameters timeRest and isIn. The nextStop will be set to 0 if it is an InRoute bus, 4 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        timeRest - is the time that the bus need to rest at South P.
        isIn - is a boolean result that states whether the bus is In Route bus. True if it is. False otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • unload

        public int unload(int dest)
        The method will unload the passenger if the bus arrived to their destinations.
        Parameters:
        dest - is the destination.
        Returns:
        the number of passenger that unloaded.
